meanings.definition: A label bearing the owner's name and often a design, pasted usually on the inside cover of a book.
meanings.sent1: I carefully placed the bookplates inside my favorite books.
meanings.sent2: She collected bookplates with different designs for her library.
meanings.sent3: The bookplates in the library decided to have a race to see who could stick the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The bookplates were like tiny flags declaring ownership in the sea of books.
meanings.sent5: The shiny bookplates sparkled under the dim light of the library.

meanings.definition: To affix a bookplate to a book.
meanings.sent1: I always bookplate my books to make sure they don't get lost.
meanings.sent2: He carefully bookplates each book in his collection.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to bookplate the curtains instead of the books.
meanings.sent4: She bookplated her favorite book as a symbol of her love for reading.
meanings.sent5: The librarian bookplates every new addition to the library with precision.
